body:
Thanks to Midnight for the idea and the format!

Welcome back to another Plug.DJ session. This week's theme will be "Pop."

When is it?
EST: 7:00 PM
PST: 4:00 PM

There is no specific end time.

I have a profile. Now what?
You can start a pre-party, maybe tell a few friends to come along and have a good time!
Remember that the link is:
https://plug.dj/avicus


I don't have an account :c
If this is your first time ever using plug.dj, you will need to sign up. Go to their page here:

https://plug.dj/dashboard

Follow the instructions to create a profile.
Keep in mind that once you create a username, you cannot change it in the future, so do not impersonate others.

https://plug.dj/avicus

Once you "plug" into the hangout (haha), create a playlist of songs by searching up your favourites on YouTube, and then join the wait list! Once it's your turn to DJ, everyone in the hangout can dance, listen, and have a good time to your song!

Cool. Any rules?
Basic behaviour rules apply. Don't be rude to others in chat, try to limit the amount of inappropriate language you use in the chat. Any person found doing this will receive a warning.

Basic video rules apply. Please do not play any videos that may contain gory/sexual/racist/homophobic/violent content. Any person found playing such content will receive a warning, followed by a ban.

Have fun!

title: PlugDJ Friday! Pop Music!

replies.body: I assume this is tomorrow... If so, there are interviews then so I doubt i'll be able to make it!
replies.body_tagged: I assume this is tomorrow... If so, there are interviews then so I doubt i'll be able to make it!

replies.body: Are these events limited to these styles, or are they solely base off of pop, and allow other music?
replies.body_tagged: Are these events limited to these styles, or are they solely base off of pop, and allow other music?

replies.body: Pop music is the theme, you are allowed to play any type of music as long as you don't break the PlugDJ rules.
replies.body_tagged: Pop music is the theme, you are allowed to play any type of music as long as you don't break the PlugDJ rules.

replies.body: Sounds good! Expect me to be at the event.

Looking forward to it!

replies.body: The party will be starting soon!

replies.body: We had a great turn out lots of people! Hoping to make this more of a weekly event.
